string-array.name: water
string-array.item: Keep the water in your mouth for a while before swallowing
Do not drink water immediately after eating
Do not drink cold or iced water
Drinking water while sitting is better than while standing or moving
If you can, drink water as soon as you wake up
Drink at least eight glasses a day
If you don\'t feel like drinking water, find alternatives (but be careful with sugars)
If you do sports, try to drink lots of water
Fruits and vegetables are important, Let\'s Hydrate does not take them into account in the calculation

Drink water needed by the brain to manufacture hormones and neurotransmitters
Drink water helps deliver oxygen all over the body
